experience: You and Karin both know Yacov Wrocherinsky, Trent Broberg, and 15 others
We collect orthopedic patient-reported outcomes for providers and hospitals.We believe outcome data will change medicine.

Salesforce.com Administrator and Marketing Specialist of a global, privately-held semiconductor capital equipment manufacturer headquartered in metro Phoenix, AZ.Implement, customize and administer company’s global and multi-currency customer relationship management (CRM) system, Salesforce.com (Classic and Lightning Experience). Day to day includes the following:- Salesforce.com Customization- Marketing Campaigns- Process Builder- Training /Adoption- Troubleshooting- Data Cleansing- Analytics- Security- User On-boarding and Off-boarding- Coordinate Company Events and Tradeshows

Coordinated and managed Domestic and International travel, created and developed budgeting and monthly spending reports, designed company travel policies, implemented employee travel and expense policy training.

In charge of all aspects of running own art and design business, including budgets, accounting, client relations, marketing and branding, advertising, website design and maintenance, email, photography, and customer service and communication.www.coolrooms.us

Working with Karin was an absolute pleasure. Her first-hand knowledge of the sales process coupled with her exceptional capabilities within SalesForce provides her with the unique perspective appreciated by sales staff and management, alike. As an intangible, Karin's contagious positivity shines through in her approach of viewing every challenge or complication as an opportunity to improve.  This, in addition to her work ethic, makes her an extremely valuable asset that any organization would be lucky to have Karin as part of their team.

"Guz" Schwartz
President & CEO at NW Governmental Affairs
May 12, 2016, "Guz" worked with Karin in different groups

President & CEO at NW Governmental AffairsI have had 20 years of senior management/leadership experience in the military, 15 years higher education teaching around the world, eight years as owner/caregiver of two adult family homes, and a lobbyist for seniors/retirees/veterans issues for 20 years. Degrees in Political Science/Psychology, Accounting/Computer Science, Finance/Management, and Personnel Counseling.. I post these only to give the reader a picture of the varied contacts and positions I held, many of which Karin was associated. I have known Karin on and off for a period of over 30 years. She is one of the .most diligent/creative persons I have ever had the pleasure of knowing and working with. She is mission oriented while keeping in mind the welfare of the people working with and for her. She is one person who you can give a mission to and know that it will be done expertly and in a timely period.  With this said, she also welcomes ideas and assistance always giving credit to those involved. I would not hesitate to employ Karin in any position requiring the maximum of intelligence with a need to get the "job" successfully completed with a minimum of supervision.She can best be summed up as ”the go-to-gal” in ANY critical or otherwise need. In addition, she is blessed with extraordinary cultured talents.   less

April 26, 2016, Karin worked with Mike in the same group

I wanted to take a moment and offer recognition of an extremely talented person. I have had the privilege of working with Karin McWilliams for several years and it is rare to have a person who is not only excellent at her position as the Salesforce.com administrator for a global company, but equally impressive as the teacher/trainer/support for all those who use the system, new hires and those who need her expertise to navigate Sales Force and find or input the information they need. Most can do one or the other… great. She does both. She understands Sales Force and leverages that expertise to solve problems,  analyze and interpret the data to create integrated tools for Marketing and Sales Executives to make sound decisions and optimize future strategies and plans to grow the company.

I have had the privilege of working with Karin. She is a team player who brings a positive can-co attitude in the workplace. She is a self starter and will go the extra mile to see a job get done and done correctly. Karin is always ready to help out in any type of project. She works well across all departments. She is also an excellent trainer. Not only did Karin do a great job of leading the corporate Salesforce.com efforts, she also coordinated trade show events and other supported/lead many other activities for the sales and business development teams. I would highly recommend Karin to any organization. She would bring a professional, personable attitude, can-do spirit along with a great multitalented skill set.

Tamara McKinney Berry
Editor,  Content Manager at Capgemini
December 26, 2014, Tamara was senior to Karin but didn’t manage directly

During my tenure as Director of Marketing at OEM Group, Inc. (2011-2013) I worked closely with Karin McWilliams on a variety of high-profile, high-impact projects. It was Karin’s thorough understanding of – and dedication to – the cloud-based CRM tool Salesforce that helped our far-flung global team smoothly transition to successful adoption of the productivity-enhancing platform. Her patience, technical expertise and collaborative training style led to OEM Group’s widespread use of Salesforce-enabled analytics and optimization of our team’s targeted sales and marketing activities. In conjunction with launching and maintaining Salesforce  Karin consistently delivered reliable, self-motivated support on projects ranging from domestic and international trade shows and the production of a range of product materials and sales collateral. She organized and led ongoing training webinars for the OEM Group sales team to ensure consistent and complete understanding of the company’s dynamic portfolio of semiconductor capital equipment and services. Karin’s upbeat, consider-it-done style earned her the reputation as a trusted “go-to” professional within our group.
Tamara McKinney Berry
